name: Test - Initial Setup
notes: Base settings for the live test plan. Configured to force a stall in DRY mode.

name: Test - DRY (Success)
notes: Test preset for a successful DRY cycle. Stall Delta is set to 0.1% to prevent stalling.

name: Test - HEAT (Stop)
notes: Test preset for HEAT mode with a 6-minute timer, set to STOP on completion.

name: Test - HEAT (Warm)
notes: Test preset for HEAT mode with a 6-minute timer, set to WARM on completion.
